Description.0: Lab Report: Laboratory assessment. Consists of a pre-lab online quiz, the performance of the stuent in the lab and a submitted lab report sheet.
Description.1: Examination: End of trimester exam to take place during exam period. It will be a quiz-style exam and will be held online (via Brightspace).
Description.2: Class Test: Two, 20 minute, in-class MCQs, carried out during workshops in weeks 6 and 10. These will be taken via the module Brightspace page.
